snippet.title: Amelia's Diner - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Amelia's Diner is a restaurant simulation arcade game.

You are the owner of a small restaurant and welcome hungry customers. Fullfill their orders and make them happy with various delicious foods like burgers, sandwiches, donuts and soft drinks. Solve different levels with progressive difficulty or unlock the endless shift mode. Earn coins and decorate your diner with different floor tiles, plants and tablet sets.

Developed and published by Kistler Benjamin
Also released for Xbox One and Nintendo Switch

#ps4 #playstation4 #ameliasdiner #kistlerbenjamin #ripoffs #clones #theforeseenarcade 

"Mom, can we have Diner Dash?"
"We have Diner Dash at home!"
Diner Dash at home in question? This game.

Seriously, though: since EA owns Glu Mobile, who themselves own Diner Dash and its developer PlayFirst, this is the closest we can get to Diner Dash on modern consoles.
